title: _DRAW_SPHERE
content:
0x799017F9E3B10112// DrawSphere
void _DRAW_SPHERE(float x, float y, float z, float radius, int r, int g, int b, float opacity);Parameters:x: X coordinate of the spherey: Y coordinate of the spherez: Z coordinate of the sphereradius: Size of the sphere, 1.0 = 1 meterr: Color red 0-255g: Color green 0-255b: Color blue 0-255opacity: Opacity from 0.0-1.0Draws a 3D sphere, typically seen in the GTA:O freemode event "Penned In".Example image:DrawSphere(35.45, 172.66, 126.22, 1.0, 0, 0, 255, 0.2)
codeBlocks:
// DrawSphere
void _DRAW_SPHERE(float x, float y, float z, float radius, int r, int g, int b, float opacity);
